div.p: Both K7 Open Houses (morning and evening) and the scheduled morning HS sesssion are rescheduled to the same times and locations next Tuesday, January 17.

Thank you for visiting our Web site and for your interest in our school community.
We've designed this site both as an overview of our school for visitors who are new to us and as a library of information for the families we serve. Behind this page, you'll find subpages with more specific overviews as well as links to key documents and forms.
Community School of Davidson, a North Carolina Public Charter School, welcomes students of any race, color, and national or ethnic origin.

h5.span: CSD Families and friends are invited to join us as we celebrate the newest extension of our classroom learning. Join us for arts, athletics and see where continued academic pursuits will take place in our largest outdoor classroom!
